abstract: Boston Fine Arts Museum pub portfolio, French Renaissance
snippet: SPONSORED and originated by the American Artists Professional League, American Art Week, with F. Ballard Wil  liams as national chairman, is observed every year throughout the United States and is being held this week, until Nov. 7....
lead_paragraph: SPONSORED and originated by the American Artists Professional League, American Art Week, with F. Ballard Wil liams as national chairman, is observed every year throughout the United States and is being held this week, until Nov. 7.
